comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
The Charlie Parker Quintet played at the Deuces opposite Margie Hyams from  March 25– c. April 14, 1948.
(“Street Stirs: Disc Ousted,“ Down Beat, April 7 1948).
(“Goings on about Town: Three Deuces,” New Yorker, April 10, 1947, 7).
